alert.note: Alert for Calhoun; Chickasaw; Lee; Monroe; Pontotoc (Mississippi) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Memphis (Western Tennessee, Eastern Arkansas and Northern Mississippi)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 18 at 6:38AM CDT by NWS Memphis
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of northern Chickasaw, northeastern Calhoun, southern Pontotoc, southwestern Lee and northwestern Monroe Counties through 715 AM CDT... At 637 AM CDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Randolph, or 11 miles southwest of Pontotoc, moving east at 45 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Verona, Okolona, Shannon, Troy, Houlka, Nettleton, New Houlka, Algoma, Robbs, Pannell, Matthews, Leotis, Old Union, Wallfield and George P Cossar State Park. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. A Severe Thunderstorm Watch remains in effect until 1000 AM CDT for northeastern Mississippi.
